title: Collaborative Science Projects Using Audiovisual Media in Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Science project execution via collaborative learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing learner-generated media content creation and utilization

learning_goals: Learners can produce one-minute video content explaining scientific phenomena using smartphone-based tools
Learners can propose at least three strategies to improve the educational effectiveness of media content created through a peer feedback system.
Learners can apply communication and coordination skills with peer learners to complete tasks during collaborative projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
